name: Germs!
description:
Avoid the germs while collecting gunk and keep your microbe alive for as long as you can!

Easy to play but how long will you last?

Speedy power ups aid you reach the game center leaderboard.

Check out our other games.


Your a clean, pure hearted little organism who has to get away from the nasty bacteria plague.

Be quick and nimble as it's up to you to direct your hero thru the terrors of the microscopic battle.

Avoid virus and bacteria like creatures with quick twitch decisions.
Fun for all ages and you can compete against friends on game center.

Features:

+ Unlock new enemies with high scores
+ Simple yet… intuitive twitch-like gameplay
+ Fast and fun
+ Post score to game center
+ Highly addicting
+ World and Individual Ranking
+ Battle Friends Online

Get it while it's free!

Download it now!
